namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambūddhassa
evamme sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharati sūbhagavane sālarājamūle
tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhu āmantesi bhikkhavo ti bhadante ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosum bhagavā etadavoca sabbadhammamūlapariyā
yaṃ vo bhikkhave desissāmi taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karotha bhāsissāmī ti evam bhante ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato pacca
ssosum bhagavā etadavoca
idha bhikkhave assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāṃssāvi?vī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme
avinīto sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito sañjānāti paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito sañña
tvā paṭhaviṃ maṃñati paṭhaviyā maṃñati paṭhavito maṃñati paṭhavimmeti maṃñati paṭhaviṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
āpaṃ āpato sañjānāti āpaṃ āpato saṃñatvā āpaṃ maṃñati āpasmiṃ mañati āpato maṃñati āpammeti maṃñati āpaṃ abhinanda
ti taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi tejaṃ tejejato saṃjānāti tejaṃ tejato saṃñatvā tejaṃ maṃñati tejasmiṃ mañña
ti tejato maṃñati tejammeti maṃñati tejaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi vāyaṃ vāyato saṃjānāti vāyaṃ vāsato saṃñatvā vāyaṃ maṃñati vāyasmiṃ maṃñati vāyato maṃñati vāyammeti maṃñati vāyaṃ abhinanditi taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
bhūte bhūtato sañjānāti bhute bhutato saṃñatvā bhūte maṃñati bhutesu maṃñati bhūtato maṃ
ñati bhūte meti maṃñati bhute abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi vede vedevato sañjānāti deve devato saṃñatvā deve maṃñati -devesu maṃñati devato maṃñati deve meti maṃñati deve meti abhinandati taṃ kissa hetū apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi pajāpatiṃ pajāpatito saṃjānāti pajāpatiṃ pajāpatito saṃñatvā pajāpatiṃ maññati pajāpatismiṃ maṃ
ñati pajāpatito maṃñati pajāpatimmeti maññati pajāpatiṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi brahmaṃ bramahmato saṃjānāti brahmaṃ brahmato saṃñatvā brahmaṃ maṃñati brahmaṃti maṃñati brahmato maṃñati brahma meti maṃñati brahmaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
ābhassare ābhassarato saṃjānāti ābhassare ābhassarato saṃñatvā ābhassare maṃñati ābhassaresu maṃñati ābhassarato maṃñati ābhassare meti maṃñati ābhassare abhinandati taṃ kissa hetū apariṃñātiṃtaṃ tassā ti vadāmi subhakiṇṇaṃ sūbhakiṇhato sañjānāti subhakiṇhesū sūbhakiṇha
to saṃñatvā -subhakiṇhe maṃñati subhakiṇhesu maṃñati subhakiṇhato maṃñati subhakiṇha meti maṃñati subhakiṇhe abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi vehapphale vehapphalato sañjānāti vehapphale vehapphalato saṃñatvatvā vehapphale maṃñati vehapphalesū
maṃñati vehapphalato maṃñati vehapphale meti maṃñati vehapphale abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi abhibhuṃ abhibhuto sañjānāti abhibhuṃ abhibhūto saṃñatvā abhibhuṃ maṃñati abhibhusmiṃ maṃñati abhibhuto maṃñati abhibhummeti maṃñati abhibhuṃ abhinandati taṃ
kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanato sañjānāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ vāya ākāsānañcāyatanasetāto saṃñatvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ maṃñati ākāsānañcāyatanasmiṃ maṃñati ākāsānañcāyatanato maṃñati ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ meti maṃñati ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñā
taṃ tassā ti vadāmi viṃñānañcāyatanaṃ viññānañcāyatanato sañjānāti viññānañcāyatanaṃ viññānañcāyatanato saṃñatvā viṃñānañcāyatanaṃ maṃñati viṃñāṇañcāyatanasmiṃ maṃñati viṃñānañcāyatanato maṃñati viññānañcāyatanammeti maṃñati viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetū apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ā
kiṃcaṃñāyatanaṃ ākiṃñāyatanato saṃjānāti ākiṃcaññāyatanaṃ ākiṃcaññāyatanaṃ ākiṃcaññāyatanato saṃñatvā ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ maṃñati ākiñcaññāyatanasmiṃ maṃñati ākiñcaññāyatanato maṃñati ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato sañjā
nāti nevasaññanāsaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato saṃñatvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ maṃñati nevasaṃñānāsaññāyatanasmiṃ maṃñati nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato maṃñati nevasaññānāsaṃñāyatanammeti maññati nevasaṃñānāsaññāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhato sañjā
nāti diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhato saṃñatvā diṭṭhaṃ maṃñati diṭṭhasmiṃ maṃñati diṭṭhato maṃñati diṭṭhaṃ meti maññati diṭṭhaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sutaṃ sutato saṃjānāti sutaṃ sutato saṃñatvā sutaṃ maṃññati sutasmiṃ maṃñati sutato maṃñati sūtammeti maṃñati sutaṃ
abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi mutaṃ mutato saṃjānāti mutaṃ mutato saṃñatvā mutaṃ maṃñati mutasmiṃ maṃñati mutato maṃñati mutammeti maṃñati mutaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi viṃñātaṃ viṃñātato sañjānāti
viṃñātaṃ viṃñātato saṃñatvā viṃñātaṃ maṃñati viṃñātasmiṃ maṃñati viṃñātato maṃñati viṃñātammeti maṃñati viṃñātaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
ekattaṃ ekattato saṃjānāti ekattaṃ ekattato saṃñatvā ekatta maṃñati ekattasmiṃ
maṃñati ekattato maṃñati ekattammeti maṃñati ekattaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nānattaṃ nānattato saṃjānāti nānattaṃ nānattato saṃñatvā nānānattaṃ maṃñati nānattasmiṃ maṃñāti nānattato maṃñati nānattammeti maṃña
ti nānattattaṃ abhinandatoti taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sabbaṃ sabbato saṃjānāti sabbaṃ sabbato saṃñatvā sabbaṃ maṃñati sabbasmiṃ maññati sabbato maṃñati sabbammeti maṃñati sabbaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nibbānaṃ nibbānato sañjānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānatito saṃñatvā nibbānaṃ maññati nibbā
nasmiṃ maṃñati nibbānato maṃñati nibbānammeti maṃñati nibbānaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi assutavanta puthujjanābhavaseti paṭhamakabhumiparicchedo
yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu sekho appattamānaso anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamāno viharati sopi paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhi
jānāti paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhiṃñāya paṭhaviṃ vā maṃñati paṭhavitoyā maṃñati paṭhavito vā maṃñati paṭha?viṃvivā abhinandatimmeti vā maṃñati paṭhaviṃ vā abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññeyyaṃ tassā vadāmi ...pe... āpaṃ tejaṃ vā vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ
ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhūṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viṃñāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaṃñānāsaṃñāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viṃñātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ
nibbānato abhiṃñāya nibbānaṃ vā maṃñati nibbānasmiṃ vā maṃñi nibbānato vā maññi nibbānammeti vā maṃñi nibbānaṃ vā abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu avipariṃñeyyaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sekhāvahavivaṭṭa ddhavaseti dutiyakakaṃbhumiparicchedo
yopi so bhikkhave
bhikkhu aharahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojaniyo sammadaṃñā vimutto sopi paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhināti paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhiṃñāya paṭhaviṃ maññati paṭhaviyā maṃñati paṭhavimmeti na maññati paṭhaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariṃñātaṃ tassā ti
vadāmi āpaṃ tejaṃ ...pe... nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maṃñati nibbānasmiṃ na maṃñati nibbānato na maṃñati nibbānammeti na maṃñati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātiṃtaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
khīṇāsavāha paṭhamakanaye tatiyakabhūmiparicchedi
yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaṃñā vimutto sopi paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhijānāti paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhiṃñāya

nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā khīṇāsavāha dutiyakanaye cattārivānakabhumiparicchedi

jānato ahaṃ bhikkhave passato āsavānaṃ khayāṃyaṃ vadāmi no ajānato no apassato kiñca bhikkhave jānato kim passato tā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti yoniso ca manasikāro ayonisohi ca manasikāro ayoniso bhikkhave manasikāroto anuppannā ceva āsavā
uppajjanti uppannā ca āsavā pavaḍḍhanti yoniso ca bhikkhave manasikaroto anuppannā ceva āsavā na uppajjanti uppannā ca āsavā pahiyanti
atthi bhikkhave āsavā dassanā pahātabbā atthi āsavā saṃvarā pahātabbā atthi āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbā atthi āsa
vā adhivāsanā pahātabbā atthi āsavā parivajjanā pahātabbā atthi āsavā vinodanā pahātabbā atthi āsavā bhāvanā pahātabbā
katamemo ca bhikkhave āsavā dassanā pahātabbā idha bhikkhave assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvi ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadha
mme avīnīto sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto manasikaraṇīye dhamme nappajānāti amanasikaraṇiye dhamme nappajānāti so manasikaraṇīye dhamme appajānanto amanasikaraṇīye dhamme appajānanto ye dhammā
na manasikaraṇīyā te dhamme manasi karoti ye dhammā manasikaraṇīyā te dhamme na manasi karoti katamemo ca bhikkhave dhammā na manasikaraṇīyā ye dhamme manasi karoti yassa bhikkhave dhamme manasikaroto anuppanno vā kāmāsavo uppajjati manasi uppanno vā kāmāsavo pavaḍḍhatotī anuppanno vā bhavāsavo
uppajjati uppanno vā bhavāsavo pavaḍḍhati anuppanno cā avijjāsavo uppajjanti uppanno vā avijjāsavo pavaḍḍhati ime dhammā na manasikaraṇīyā ye dhamme manasi kāroti katame ca bhikkhave dhammā manasikaraṇīyā ye dhamme manasi karoti yassa bhikkhave dhamme manasikaroto
